action.action-desc: Mrs. Hyde-Smith introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to modify the criteria for designation of rural emergency hospitals.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Health Sustainability Act of 2025.

section.header: Modification of criteria for designation of rural emergency hospitals
